data.title: EIDOS: Modeling primary beams of radio astronomy antennas
data.name: eidos
data.description: Modelling primary beams of radio astronomy antennas

evidence: "Primary beam modelling of radio astronomy antennas" and references to specific radio telescopes (VLA, MeerKAT) indicate a domain-specific research code from a radio astronomy group.

Usage is via a command-line tool: "Help available via `eidos -h`" and examples like "To create a primary beam Jones matrix of MeerKAT... run `eidos -p 256 -d 10 -f 1070`", showing it is an end-user application for scientific modeling.
Installation is via pip: "Installation `pip install eidos`", indicating distribution through the Python Package Index (PyPI).
